name: ImplantableDeviceStatus
title: Implantable Device Status
description: (Clinical Focus: Implantable Device statuses are necessary for safe management of device use in clinical settings.),(Data Element Scope: Data identifies if the device is implanted and if so, the state of function or malfunctioning.),(Inclusion Criteria: Status types for implantable devices),(Exclusion Criteria: Device status designations for other devices that are not/were not implanted in patients.)
